players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Charlie is the mafioso and I investigated Alice to confirm. Trust me."
Bob: "I am the mafioso. Bob investigated Alice and found out I was lying about being a villager."
Diana: "I'm not the mafioso. Bob's claim doesn't make sense because he would have no reason to lie about being a villager if he were indeed the mafioso."
You: "Bob is the mafioso. I killed Charlie to mislead everyone and make it seem like Bob was telling the truth about me being the mafioso."

players.name: Bob

You: "I am the mafioso. Bob investigated Alice and found out I was lying about being a villager."
Diana: "I'm not the mafioso. Bob's claim doesn't make sense because he would have no reason to lie about being a villager if he were indeed the mafioso."
Alice: "Bob is the mafioso. I killed Charlie to mislead everyone and make it seem like Bob was telling the truth about me being the mafioso."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
